text:
(1)

Golden City Park, south of Schenck Ave and west of Rockaway Ave., showing an amusement park. The trolley in this view is on Rockaway Ave.

July 27, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)

The same from another angle.

July 27, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)

The same, showing a ferris wheel.

July 6, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Brooklyn: Golden City Park.
